title: Google service-center finds mysterious problems.
content:
Hellos.
I followed the process and sent my Pixel in for a battery swap at the official center from the help-page for a somewhat decent price. When the phone was received and checked, it - out of nowhere - spawned a "power issue" which tripled the price of the repair. The presented choice was: pay 200-ish eurobucks or have the phone returned unchanged.

I found that unacceptable, chose the return and found the phone in perfect working order a few days later back on my desk. It charges nicely and it discharges nicely - up to a certain point.
